chapter.title: What's New in OpenICF ${docTargetVersion}
chapter.para: This release of OpenICF includes the following enhancements and new features.

listitem.para: OPENICF-252: Throw the ConnectorException with original message from runScriptOnResource and runScriptOnConnector
OPENICF-245: Upgrade LDAP connector to ICF 1.4
OPENICF-240: Update the framework version and files in Connector Archetype
OPENICF-239: Update the Groovy library in ZIP to groovy-all-2.2.2
OPENICF-238: Add startup script to Java Connectors Server for unix
OPENICF-237: Add more logging to ConnectorServer
OPENICF-232: Make the Groovy Connector OSGi Ready
OPENICF-230: Schema and the related builder classes in Java and .Net are not consistent
OPENICF-229: The BundleClassLoader does not follow the same order for class and resource resolution
OPENICF-228: The AttributeUtil and AttributeAccessor don't have methods to access all supported types
OPENICF-226: Implement Visitor patter for Filter
OPENICF-221: Create ScriptedCREST Connector
OPENICF-214: Update to commons-daemon-1.0.15
OPENICF-213: Support the GroovyObject and Groovy Connector class
OPENICF-212: Improve the Log performance by disabling the to get StackTrace each time
OPENICF-191: Need for a PowerShell generic scripted connector
OPENICF-190: Support Map<String, Object>(Java) and IDictionary<String,Object> (.Net) Attribute types
OPENICF-187: Reduce OpenICF CSV connector logging noise
OPENICF-186: Update the plugin to support the new 1.4 API features
OPENICF-185: ScriptedCommon upgrade to OpenICF 1.4
OPENICF-184: LDAP connector should detect OpenLDAP and work well with it
OPENICF-183: Update the Exchange Connector to use OpenICF 1.4 API
OPENICF-182: Update the AD Connector to work with OpenICF 1.4 API
OPENICF-179: Generic "Scripted" groovy connector
OPENICF-178: Add ObjectClass.ALL to the Framework constants
OPENICF-177: LDAP connector should provide a mechanism to get server information (vendor, version, type etc...)
OPENICF-176: Scripted Common should do lazy loading of scripts instead of loading them all at init()
OPENICF-172: Commit initial SAP Connector
OPENICF-168: Implement ResultsHandlerConfiguration.enableCaseInsensitiveFilter support
OPENICF-166: LDAP connector does not recognize AD-LDS server type
OPENICF-165: Add predefined operation options to support paged search
OPENICF-158: need for a ScriptedREST connector to address HTTP/REST (cloud) applications
OPENICF-157: ScriptedSQL connector should use scriptedcommon base package
OPENICF-155: Scripted Connectors need a common base package for script execution
OPENICF-150: LDAP connector should be able to decode AD objectGUID when it is asked as a regular attribute
OPENICF-147: Add mechanism to update last token irrespective of whether a syncdelta is generated
OPENICF-127: Ability for LDAP connector to force sync() on Timestamps
OPENICF-121: LDAP connector should be able to handle DELETE sync event when uidAttribute = RDN
OPENICF-118: Update the Framework version in connector-archetype project
OPENICF-116: LDAP connector needs selection criteria on group
OPENICF-105: LDAP connector should verify base contexts are valid
OPENICF-102: LDAP connector should be able to handle AD userAccountControl attribute
OPENICF-99: LDAP connector: referral handling should be configurable
OPENICF-97: LDAP Connector should have an ACtive Directory changelog strategy
OPENICF-96: LDAP Connector should have a generic changelog strategy
OPENICF-95: LDAP Connector needs to support AD ObjectGUID binary field
OPENICF-92: AD connector should use the GUID as the __UID__ for groups and organizationalUnit
OPENICF-85: Group ObjectClass should be configurable and not hardcoded
OPENICF-83: ScriptedSQL connector should implement the schema() API call.
OPENICF-65: Solaris connector runScriptOnResource() method needs improvement
OPENICF-64: Checking available commands should be optional on the Solaris connector
OPENICF-63: Add new VersionRange class
